MMFARM-POW-2025-001.event: First TikTok Post — Start of Real-Work Data Recording
MMFARM-POW-2025-001.note: This marks the first public timestamp of MaMeeFarm Real-Work Data.

MMFARM-POW-2025-002.event: Mint '7 Ducks of Hope' NFT Collection on OpenSea
MMFARM-POW-2025-002.note: Represents the first Proof-of-Work NFT series of MaMeeFarm.

MMFARM-POW-2025-003.event: Mint 'Seed of Hope' NFT Collection on OpenSea
MMFARM-POW-2025-003.note: Symbolic Genesis Layer of MaMeeFarm’s data story.

MMFARM-POW-2025-004.event: Official Release of MaMeeFarm Proof-of-Work License (MMFARM-POL-2025)
MMFARM-POW-2025-004.note: Establishes the official framework for licensing Real-Work Data.

MMFARM-POW-2025-005.event: Concept Archive Initiated on GitHub (MaMeeFarm-Concepts Repository)
MMFARM-POW-2025-005.note: The first conceptual documentation of the Proof-of-Work Data System.
